name: Atlantis Is Sinking
description:
I moved to New York knowing it would be underwater in ten years. Now it's time to move out. 

An entry for the 2019 Sub-Q Environment Jam. 831 words across all paths, 7 "panels" (rooms), 9 if you count ending screens. Audio by Mike Koenig. 

Coincidentally, the Broadway Station entrance on the G line was flooded on purpose recently to prepare for storm surges. 

#subQjam
